info.name: Face Recognition API
info.description: Complete API collection for Face Recognition System with PostgreSQL, S3, and security features

request.description: Get API information and available endpoints. Public endpoint.
Health check endpoint for monitoring. Public endpoint.
Master admin login endpoint
Management login endpoint
Faculty login endpoint
Student login endpoint using college ID
Master admin sign-up endpoint. Password must be 6+ chars, contain 1 number and 1 special character.
Management self-signup endpoint. If college_code exists, links to it. If not, creates a new college. Students/faculty with this college_code will be auto-linked to this management user.
Faculty sign-up endpoint. If college_code is provided, faculty will be auto-linked to the management user of that college.
Student sign-up endpoint. If college_code is provided, student will be auto-linked to the management user of that college.
Refresh access token using refresh token
Check if user exists by email or roll number. Returns existence, email, and whether password is set.
Send OTP to email address. OTP expires in 10 minutes.
Verify OTP code. Returns success if OTP is valid and not expired.
Set password for first-time setup (post-OTP verification). User should verify OTP first.
Reset password (forgot password flow). User should verify OTP first.
Unified login endpoint with email + password. Returns JWT tokens and user info.
Logout (invalidate session/token)
Get current authenticated user information
Create a new API key for the current user
List all API keys for the current user
Revoke an API key by ID. Replace '1' with actual key ID.
Create a new college (master admin only). Must be created before creating management accounts for it.

Create a management account for a college (master admin only). Links management to college via college_code. If college_name is provided, updates the college name. Students/faculty with this college_code will be auto-linked to this management user.

query.description: Filter by role: management, faculty, student
Filter by status: active, inactive, suspended

request.description: List users by role (paginated, filterable). Master admin only.
Get user by ID. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual user ID.
Create user (management / faculty / student). Master admin only.
Update user. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual user ID.
Soft-deactivate user. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual user ID.
Admin reset user password. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual user ID.
Get user counts by role. Master admin only.
Get own profile. All authenticated users.
Update own profile. All authenticated users.
List colleges. Master: all colleges, Management: own college only.
Get college by ID. Master and Management (own college only). Replace '1' with actual college ID.
Create college. Master admin only.
Update college. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual college ID.
Activate/deactivate college. Master admin only. Replace '1' with actual college ID.

query.description: Filter by status: active, warning, suspended
Search by name, email, or roll number

request.description: List students (management's college). Management only.
Get student by ID. Management only. Replace '1' with actual student ID.
Bulk import students from JSON data. Management only.
Update student. Management only. Replace '1' with actual student ID.
Register/update face photo for student. Management only. Replace '1' with actual student ID.
Issue warning / suspend student. Management only. Replace '1' with actual student ID. Action types: warning, suspension_1d, suspension_3d, suspension_7d, counseling, expulsion.
List incidents (reports) involving student. Management only. Replace '1' with actual student ID.

query.description: Search by name, email, or faculty ID

request.description: List faculty (management's college). Management only.
Get faculty by ID. Management only. Replace '1' with actual faculty ID.
Bulk import faculty from JSON data. Management only.
Update faculty. Management only. Replace '1' with actual faculty ID.

formdata.description: Media files (images/videos). At least one required.

query.description: ragging, fighting, misbehaviour, money, faculty, others

request.description: Create incident report (faculty / student). Requires at least one media file (image/video).

query.description: Filter by status: pending, investigating, resolved, rejected
Search by location, description, or report ID

request.description: List reports with role-based filtering. Master: all, Management: own college, Faculty/Student: own reports.
Get report by ID. Role-scoped access. Replace '1' with actual report ID.
Update report status. Management and Master only. Replace '1' with actual report ID.
Get AI detection results (faces) for a report. Management and Master only. Replace '1' with actual report ID.
Take disciplinary action on students. Management only. Replace '1' with actual report ID.
Upload report media (image/video). Faculty and Student only.
Get report media URLs. Management, Master, and report owner can access. Replace '1' with actual report ID.

query.description: Filter by level: info, warning, error, success
Filter by category: authentication, report, user_management, system, database, ai_detection

request.description: List system logs. Master admin only.
Export logs (CSV/JSON). Master admin only.
Export logs (CSV/JSON). Master admin only.
Master dashboard stats. Master admin only.
Management dashboard stats. Management only.
Faculty dashboard stats. Faculty only.
Student dashboard stats. Student only.

formdata.description: Video file to upload (mp4, avi, mov, mkv, flv). Max size: 500MB

request.description: Upload incident video for face recognition processing. Returns immediately with video_id. Processing happens in background.
Get processing status for a video. Status can be: pending, processing, completed, failed. Replace {{video_id}} with actual video ID.
Get face recognition results for a completed video. Returns detailed match information. Replace {{video_id}} with actual video ID.
Delete video and its processing results. Users can only delete their own videos, admins can delete any. Replace {{video_id}} with actual video ID.
